summary:
Catherine has an in depth understanding of and experience in Business Analytics through experience in a number of Global Finance-IT projects at Shell. She also has experience in a number of end to end Finance processes; including Requisition to Pay, Intergroup and MI reporting, 
Catherine displays strong interpersonal effectiveness; she is delivery focused and self-motivated to achieve the task at hand as well as going the extra mile to deliver over and above expectation. She also has a skill in delivering results through others by providing high-quality motivation and coaching.

Catherine has a key skill in collaboration and is able to build strong and trusting relationships with business partners through high quality engagement; ensuring a good balance between advocacy and inquiry to drive the delivery of business value.

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

company.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

profile_positions.description:
The IT Advisory role provides support to the IT Manager (ITM) in delivering bottom line value to the business through implementation of innovative, new IT solutions and harvesting existing IT assets to enable the achievement of the business strategy, value drivers and KPIs.  The key focus areas of the role are:
•	Relationship management 
•	Business intelligence
•	Integrated Business and IT strategy
•	Innovation
•	IT Portfolio Management
•	Value Generation
profile_positions.title: Senior Information Technology Advisor

profile_positions.description:
2016 – Date, Business Analyst Finance MI, Report One Competence Centre
Following the delivery of the Insight 2 Win (I2W) programme the Report One
Competence Centre was created to manage and deliver projects and enhancements
within the Report One Landscape as well as application portfolio management to the
Group Controller, Group Reporting and end user organisation.

Responsibilities include:
•	BA for IFRS16 central solution implementation; developing and documenting high level functional and non-functional requirements to assist in short listing tools on the market as well as arranging demos with shortlisted vendors. Working with Product Owner to develop user stories for Product Backlog for Agile implementation methodology.
•	BA for Beyond Fountain Replacement; developing and documenting product backlog items with the Product Owner and business representatives.
•	BA for Executive Dashboarding; developing and documenting requirements with the business as well as functional design documentation and test strategy documentation and implementation.
•	BA for Report One Release 2017; creating the requirements traceability matrix to trace scope through requirements to test plan to ensure that all agreed scope items have been included in the design of the solution. Additional responsibilities included; systems integration testing of the Group KPIs, acting as focal point for Group Reporting for User Acceptance Testing, and creation of the Pre-Deployment review.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst Finance MI

profile_positions.description:
•	Identification and definition of the business needs of FIN-IT stakeholders in the area of FIN-IT to help determine IT solution(s) to meet their business needs or resolve their business problem(s).
•	Develop a deep understanding of the business, the processes, the applications, and the information and data, in the FIN-IT, and provides business analyses support to delivery vertical teams and consultancy assistance to the Business Interface (BI) to drive value for the business.
•	Consultancy: Provides well-informed advice, typically within a specific technical area, ensuring that it is properly understood and appropriately exploited, to enhance the effectiveness of significant activities
•	Business Process Testing: Designs and manages tests of new/updated processes. Specifies test environment for whole lifecycle testing (e.g. using a model office concept). Manages the selection/creation of relevant scenarios for testing and ensures that tests reflect realistic operational business conditions. Ensures that tests and results are documented, reported to stakeholders and are available for specification of user instructions
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst Finance MI - Shell Insight 2 Win Program

profile_positions.description:
•	Managing a team of 13 people responsible for the Accounts Payable (AP) sub-process of the Requisition to Pay Process for Shell Singapore and Shell Downstream Chemicals Asia Pacific Region
•	Manage all aspects of operational delivery: delivering against targets; organizing and coordinating workload; human resource aspects such as resourcing, managing turnover and retention, training, role handovers, knowledge management and specialist development, and managing performance/underperformance; business partner and vendor engagement.
•	Act as a role model of Leadership for the team passionately supporting the development of direct reports and the team as well as building an overall healthy team community.
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable Manager Singapore and Asia Chemicals

profile_positions.description:
•	Deliver consistent, simplified and standardized processes for all intergroup transactions. This includes Billing, Debt Management, Reconciliations, Reporting and Query Management.
•	Perform the Intergroup reconciliations of all Shell South Africa entities and to follow up on all reconciling items and ensure that ageing does not exceed 60 days.
•	Effectively communicate with Finance and business stakeholders to ensure timely application of cash.
•	Review and analyze all IG customer/vendor accounts to ensure that outstanding invoices are kept to a minimum.
•	To run IG reports for distribution and use within the team as well as those that might benefit from it (Class of Business, Management, etc).
•	Trouble-shoot to determine the root-causes for any abnormalities occurring in the IG processes or within the IG team.
•	Extract and analyse data, and summarize and present the information regarding IG Key Performance Indicators for the South African IG team.
profile_positions.title: Intergroup Analyst
